Body: I have a galaxy 7262 star pro which i rooted and installed CWM.I downloaded a KitKat 4.4 ROM for it from this site http://www.mediafire.com/download/9goov6otuwmqwsc/S7262.zip?9ccc16 and followed the steps mentioned here http://guidesdna.com/update-galaxy-star-pro-s7262-android-4-4-kitkat/However, after installation, when I rebooted my phone, the Samsung logo showed and after that the phone was stuck on a black screen. I am unable to understand what went wrong.From where do I get a proper KitKat custom ROM for my phone?
Title: Samsung Galaxy Star Pro 7262 not booting after custom ROM

history.Text: I have a galaxy 7262 star pro which i rooted and installed CWM.I downloaded a KitKat 4.4 ROM for it from this site `http://www.mediafire.com/download/9goov6otuwmqwsc/S7262.zip?9ccc16` and followed the steps mentioned here `http://guidesdna.com/update-galaxy-star-pro-s7262-android-4-4-kitkat/`However, after installation, when I rebooted my phone, the Samsung logo showed and after that the phone was stuck on a black screen. I am unable to understand what went wrong.From where do I get a proper KitKat custom ROM for my phone?
Samsung Galaxy Star Pro 7262 not booting after custom ROM
